title: Program to solve a problem - impact

content.prompt: A software company created a program to help solve a problem in a community. Which of the following is a true statement about the program?

choices.label: The program can be reused by other programmers without obtaining permission.
The program could have unintended harmful effects beyond its intended use.
The program should be implemented with as few abstractions as possible.
The program will improve the system reliability of other programs.

skill.text: 5.A: Explain how computing impacts society, economy, and culture.
